classification.task_goal: Implement functionality for targeting and displaying text in UE5 using AGameplayAbilityTargetActor_GroundTrace.
primary_constraints: Override StartTargeting function to bind CanceledDelegate.
Create and display a UUserWidget during targeting.
Remove the UUserWidget when targeting ends.
